metadata.title: CVE-2023-5388 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
NSS was susceptible to a timing side-channel attack when performing RSAdecryption. This attack could potentially allow an attacker to recover theprivate data. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 124, Firefox ESR <115.9, and Thunderbird < 115.9.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5388` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.98-1
libnss3-tools - 2:3.98-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nss package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:3.98-1').
thunderbird package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
